judicialResults.label: Sent to Crown Court for trial in custody
judicialResults.resultText:
CCII - Sent to Crown Court for trial in custody
Sent for trial under Section 51(1) & (2)(b) of the Crime and Disorder Act 1998. Bail remand days to count (tagged days): 2. No indication given re victim personal statement. Remanded in custody until hearing on 25/07/2025 at 10:00 in Courtroom 01, City of London Magistrates' Court, hearing on 25/07/2025 at 15:33, Croydon Crown Court. Basis: Before conviction. Bail exceptions: Likely to offend. Reason for applying: noen. Custody time limit expires on 25/07/2025. Time spent in custody: 2.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 36(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1988, Schedule 9 to the Traffic Signs Regulations and General Directions 2016 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.
offences.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 36(1) o Ddeddf Traffig y Ffyrdd 1988, Atodlen 9 i Reoliadau Arwyddion Traffig a Chyfeiriadau Cyffredinol 2016 ac Atodlen 2 i Ddeddf Troseddwyr Traffig Ffyrdd 1988.
offences.offenceTitle: Motor vehicle fail to comply with a stop sign - manned equipment
offences.offenceTitleWelsh: Cerbyd modur heb gydymffurfio ag arwydd stop - cyfarpar a reolir gan unigolyn
offences.wording: On 12/07/2018 at Brighton, without reasonable excuse, failed to give assistance that you were under a duty to give to a person authorised to execute a search warrant granted under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by the Liverpool Magistrates' Court on 02/07/2018
offences.wordingWelsh: On 12/07/2018 at Brighton, without reasonable excuse, failed to give assistance that you were under a duty to give to a person authorised to execute a search warrant granted under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by the Liverpool Magistrates' Court on 02/07/2018
